title: Font used in Miasmata copyright
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/copyright_4256.png)
  
I'm helping translate this game into French, and trying not to ruin the original aesthetic :)  
We wanted to add a 'translated by' under the copyright, but I can't work out what font they used for this, can anyone help?

Font: 

 Candara 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100311/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: DarkStarSword

comments.content:
Thanks! That looks like the one :)  
Not sure how I missed it either since it's already on my system :-s
